page.title: 19A Day in My Life (Part 2)
page.content: When we get home I always do my homework outside, unless its raining, because it makes me feel happy and alert. When I have finished my home- work I usually listen to some of my pop records. At about 7 o'clock my sister and I go for a walk over the fields where there are some horses. We often feed and stroke them. When we go back we usually have to have our tea. When I have finished I just walk around our garden and think how lovely the trees and birds and flowers are. Later on, all the family goes for a walk by the River Stour and through the country lanes. How I love to go for walks and listen to the insects buzzing and the trees shaking in the wind. When we get home I watch TV and mom makes us all a drink. At about 10 o'clock I go to bed and dream about this beautiful place where I live.
